chargeHist.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher Charles Morrison was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Christopher Charles Morrison is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Christopher Charles Morrison was found guilty of Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

2:36 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher Charles Morrison in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Selmer in court for Christopher Charles Morrison. Includes 22CF391 (Branch II File) 22CF61, 22FO68 & 22FO69.  ADA Ballo recites joint agreement which includes plea on 22CF391, Branch II file as part of a Global Resolution.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NC to Ct 1- Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent in 22CF61 & NC to Ct 1- Bail Jumping-Felony in 22CF391. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 in 22CF61 & Ct 1 in 22CF391. On motion of the State without objection, Crt reads in and dismisses Ct 2 in 22CF61 & Ct 2 in 22CF391.  Court also dismisses 22FO68 & 22FO69.

Court Orders: Ct 1 in 22CF61

- Court Costs: $268.00   
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $250.00
Converted to Civil Judgment. 

- 79 days county jail, credit for time served, concurrent on both convictions. 

Court Orders: Ct 1 in 22CF391

- Court Costs: $268.00   
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $250.00
Converted to Civil Judgment

- 79 days county jail, credit for time served, concurrent on both convictions.

Preliminary hearing on April 1, 2022 at 03:15 pm. Includes 22CF61, 22FO68 and 22FO69. sf

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, R.P. EXCEPT regarding minor children.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
